resources.description:
available arguments:

?f=all (get all available courses)

?f=mine (get courses that you own)

?f=coursesIn (get courses that you participating)

?f=coursesInCount (get count of courses that you participating)

?f=count (get count of all courses)
		
			&status="open", "waiting_approval", "rejected", "closed" (get count of courses with current status)
resources.name: get_courses

resources.description: Create new course (available only for user with teacher role).
resources.name: add_courses

resources.description: Delete information for course(available only for course owner).
resources.name: delete_course

resources.description: Get information for current course.
resources.name: get_current_course

resources.description: Change information for course(available only for course owner).
resources.name: update_course

resources.description:
Required argument:

		"active" = bool - True / False
resources.name: set_course_active_unactive

resources.description:
Request available only for admin
Required argument "status":
	values:
	
			"close" - only for courses with status "open"
					- "reason" required argument if status == "close"
		
			"waiting_approval"
			"rejected"
			"open"
resources.name: put_course_status

resources.description: Get your own user information.
resources.name: self_profile_info

resources.description: Set role to user (teacher/studedent).
resources.name: set_user_role

resources.description: Get user info without privacy information.
resources.name: user_profile_info

resources.description:
Available arguments:

	?r=teacher (return all users with teacher role)

	?r=student (return all users with student role)

Without arguments request will return list of all users in the system.


	?count=1 (get count of all users in platform)
		
			&role_id = 3, 4 (get all counts of teahcers or students)
resources.name: users_info
add_task

resources.description: GET all tasks for current course
resources.name: get_tasks

resources.description: GET current task for current course
resources.name: get_current_task

resources.description:
available arguments in JSON:
"is_active", "task_id"
Arguments are not required!
resources.name: put_board_on_off

resources.description: If User is owner of the cours he can delete any members from course register. If User only participating in course can delete only self from register.
resources.name: delete_participant_from_group

resources.description:
For teacher:
Required URL argument:

	-?p=<int> - to get answers for current participant for all tasks
	-?p=me - to get self answers for all tasks
resources.name: get_student_tasks_answers
add_student_answer_for_task

resources.description:
Required URL argument:
?p=<int> - participant ID

Required body arguments:
"grade": <int>
resources.name: add_task_grade_for_current_user

resources.description:
Required parameter:
	
	- p=me - for participant to get self grade for course 
	- p=<int> - for course owner to get grade for course participant

Response:

- if key "missing_answers" in response is true participant don't have answer/s for task/s in course
- if key "missing_grade" in response is true mean missing grade/s for existing participant answer/s

- if both keys are false all is right
resources.name: get_student_grad_for_course

resources.description:
request optional URL args:

	?g=int - return results for all participants in current group
	
	?u=int - return result for current user
	
	- without added args in URL, request will return results for all groups in course
resources.name: get_course_results

resources.description:
Required args in URL addres:

	?u=int (contain user_id)
resources.name: post_result

resources.description:
For teacher:
		Get info for participants and prices for teacher's own courses


	Required argument "f"
			?f=all - will return info for all courses witch teacher is owner
			
			?f=byCourse (required argument "c_id")
				+ &c_id=int will return info for current course
				
			?f=byCourseGroup (required arguments "c_id", "g_id")
				+ &c_id=int + &g_id=int will return info for current course group
				
				
For admin:
	Get info for all payments, participants and prices for course
	
	
	Required argument "f"
			?f=byCourse (required argument "c_id")
				+ &c_id=int will return info for current course
				
			?f=byCourseGroup (required arguments "c_id", "g_id")
				+ &c_id=int + &g_id=int will return info for current course group
				
			?f=byUserID (required argument "u_id")
				+ &u_id will return info for all courses owned by current user
resources.name: GET payment info

resources.description:
Required argument " f ":
		
		values:
				?f=all
				?f=byCourse + &c_id=<int>
				?f=byCourseGroup + &c_id=<int> + &g_id=<int>
resources.name: get_events

resources.description:
Available arguments:
		
		if ?courseID=int is available will ignore another arguments
		?date=2019-02-20&status=2&ownerID=1
		
		?count=1 (get count of all requests)
					&status=1, 2, 3 (get count of all requests with current status)

Without argumetns will return all approval requests with status 1 - "new" if Admin or Moderator


if is teacher will return teachers own request
resources.name: requests
delete request by ID - only Admin / Moderator
add_presentation

resources.description: Get reequest work with course_id and return names of all added presentations
resources.name: get_all_presentations_for_course

resources.description: Required_argument /name_of_presentation
resources.name: delete_presentation
